mapper.insert: insert into t_employeeinfo (employeeID, userId, employeeName, employeeSex, birthDate, IDCard, tel, fixedPhone, degree, description, address, departmentId, salary, employeeDate, fireDate, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy ) values (#{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeesex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{firedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select employeeID, userId, employeeName, employeeSex, birthDate, IDCard, tel, fixedPhone, degree, description, address, departmentId, salary, employeeDate, fireDate, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_employeeinfo
